name: Professor Blunderbuss's Bust-In
description:
Professor Blunderbuss's Bust-In is a 2d platformer where you jump and shoot your way into the fortress of the Evil Dr. Cogsworth!

This game is a class assignment.

Background Music: "Rollin at 5" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
